Question
========

Consider the following data graphic about results from the [2016 presidential election in Massachusetts](https://www.wbur.org/politicker/2016/11/08/massachusetts-election-map).

![](https://d279m997dpfwgl.cloudfront.net/wp/2016/11/massmapcanvas-1000x600.jpg)

The color palette used in this graphic is:

Answerlist
----------
* sequential, single-hue
* sequential, multi-hue
* diverging, single-hue
* diverging, multi-hue
* categorical

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False, this scale is diverging
* False, this scale is diverging
* False, this scale is multi-hue
* True.
* False, this scale is diverging
